titleInfo.title: United Fund Red Cross Joint Campaign theme - Peggy Lord performance - 1961

mods.abstract: Performance of the United Fund Red Cross Joint Campaign theme, as performed by Peggy Lord (performer), recorded in 1961 for Eddy Arnold.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
